// src/utils/lang.ts

 Â return window.localStorage.setItem(key, lang)
}

 Â return window.localStorage.getItem(key)
}

 Â return window.localStorage.removeItem(key)
}

 Â  Â makeAutoObservable(this)

import { AxiosRequestConfig } from 'axios'

/**
 *  æ‰©å±•AxiosRequestConfigç±»å‹
 */
export interface MOptions extends AxiosRequestConfig {
 Â rawData?: boolean // æ˜¯å¦è¿”å›åŸç”Ÿå“åº”æ•°æ®
 Â ignoreRepeat?: boolean // æ˜¯å¦å¿½ç•¥é‡å¤è¯·æ±‚
 Â withToken?: boolean // æ˜¯å¦æºå¸¦token
 Â codeMessageShow?: boolean // æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
 Â retryConfig?: {
 Â  Â isOpen: boolean // æ˜¯å¦å¼€å¯é‡è¿
 Â  Â count: number // é‡è¿æ¬¡æ•°
 Â  Â time: number // æ¯æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚é—´éš”æ—¶é—´
  }
}

/**
 *  å®šä¹‰è¿”å›ç±»å‹
 */
export interface ResultData<T = any> {
 Â code: number
 Â message: string
 Â result: T
}
// src/utils/http.ts
import axios, {
 Â AxiosRequestConfig,
 Â AxiosInstance,
 Â AxiosResponse,
 Â AxiosError,
 Â InternalAxiosRequestConfig,
} from 'axios'
import { MOptions, ResultData } from '@/type/http'
import { message } from 'antd'

const pendingMap = new Map<string, AbortController>()

class AxiosRequest {
 Â private service: AxiosInstance
 Â private options: MOptions
 Â constructor(options: MOptions) {
 Â  Â this.service = axios.create(options)
 Â  Â this.options = options

 Â  Â this.interceptorHandle()
  }
 Â interceptorHandle() {
 Â  Â // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆª
 Â  Â this.service.interceptors.request.use(this.requestInterceptor, (error: AxiosError) => {
 Â  Â  Â return Promise.reject(error)
 Â   })

 Â  Â // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆª
 Â  Â this.service.interceptors.response.use(this.responseInterceptor, this.responeErrorInterceptor)
  }

 Â // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
 Â private async requestInterceptor(config: InternalAxiosRequestConfig) {
 Â  Â const ignoreRepeat = (config as unknown as any)?.ignoreRepeat ?? this.options.ignoreRepeat

 Â  Â // æ˜¯å¦å¿½ç•¥é‡å¤è¯·æ±‚
 Â  Â if (ignoreRepeat) {
 Â  Â  Â addPending(config)
 Â   }
 Â  Â // è‡ªåŠ¨æºå¸¦token
 Â  Â // config.headers.Authorization = 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('token')
 Â  Â return config
  }

 Â // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
 Â private async responseInterceptor(res: AxiosResponse) {
 Â  Â // å–æ¶ˆè¯·æ±‚
 Â  Â res && removePending(res.config)
 Â  Â let resultData

 Â  Â // æ˜¯å¦è·å–åŸæ•°æ®
 Â  Â if (!this.options.rawData) {
 Â  Â  Â resultData = res.data
 Â   }

 Â  Â // å¦‚æœè¿”å›ç»“æœä¸æ˜¯200 å¹¶ä¸”éœ€è¦å¼¹é”™è¯¯æç¤º
 Â  Â if (this.options.codeMessageShow && res.data && res.data.code !== 200) {
 Â  Â  Â message.error(res.data.message) // éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®çŠ¶æ€ç è·å–å¯¹åº”å¤šè¯­è¨€
 Â  Â  Â return Promise.reject(resultData)
 Â   }

 Â  Â return resultData
  }

 Â // é”™è¯¯æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
 Â private async responeErrorInterceptor(err: AxiosError) {
 Â  Â // å–æ¶ˆçš„é‡å¤è¯·æ±‚
 Â  Â if (axios.isCancel(err)) {
 Â  Â  Â return Promise.reject(err)
 Â   }

 Â  Â // å¦‚æœæ˜¯è¶…æ—¶ï¼Œé‡è¯•
 Â  Â if ((err as AxiosError).code === 'ECONNABORTED') {
 Â  Â  Â return retry(this.service, err as AxiosError)

 Â  Â  Â // éè¶…æ—¶èµ°çŠ¶æ€ç å¤„ç†
 Â   } else {
 Â  Â  Â httpErrorStatusHandle(err)
 Â   }
  }

 Â // * å¸¸ç”¨è¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•å°è£…
 Â get<T>(url: string, params?: object, _object = {}): Promise<ResultData<T>> {
 Â  Â console.log(url, { params, ..._object })
 Â  Â return this.service.get(url, { params, ..._object })
  }
 Â post<T>(url: string, params?: object, _object = {}): Promise<ResultData<T>> {
 Â  Â return this.service.post(url, params, _object)
  }
 Â put<T>(url: string, params?: object, _object = {}): Promise<ResultData<T>> {
 Â  Â return this.service.put(url, params, _object)
  }
 Â delete<T>(url: string, params?: any, _object = {}): Promise<ResultData<T>> {
 Â  Â return this.service.delete(url, { params, ..._object })
  }
}

/**
 * @description æ·»åŠ è¯·æ±‚
 * @param config
 */
function addPending(config: AxiosRequestConfig) {
 Â removePending(config)
 Â const url = getPendingKey(config)
 Â const abortController = new AbortController()
 Â config.signal = abortController.signal
 Â if (!pendingMap.has(url)) {
 Â  Â pendingMap.set(url, abortController)
  }
}

/**
 * @description åˆ é™¤è¯·æ±‚
 * @param config
 */
function removePending(config: AxiosRequestConfig) {
 Â const url = getPendingKey(config)
 Â if (pendingMap.has(url)) {
 Â  Â const abortController = pendingMap.get(url)
 Â  Â abortController?.abort()
 Â  Â pendingMap.delete(url)
  }
}

/**
 * @description è¯·æ±‚å”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†
 * @param config
 * @returns
 */
function getPendingKey(config: AxiosRequestConfig) {
 Â return [config.url, config.method].join('&')
}

/**
 * @description é‡è¯•å¤„ç†
 * @param instance
 * @param err
 * @returns
 */
async function retry(instance: AxiosInstance, err: AxiosError) {
 Â const config: any = err.config
 Â const { time, count } = config.retryConfig ?? {}
 Â config.currentCount = config.currentCount ?? 0
 Â console.log(`æ¥å£ï¼š${config.url},ç¬¬${config.currentCount}æ¬¡é‡è¿`)
 Â if (config.currentCount >= count) {
 Â  Â return Promise.reject(err)
  }
 Â config.currentCount++
 Â await wait(time)
 Â return await instance(config)
}

/**
 * @description é‡è¯•é—´éš”æ—¶é—´
 * @param time
 * @returns
 */
function wait(time: number) {
 Â return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, time))
}

/**
 * @description å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸
 * @param err
 */
function httpErrorStatusHandle(err: AxiosError) {
 Â let message = ''
 Â if (err && err.response) {
 Â  Â switch (err.response.status) {
 Â  Â  Â case 302:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'æ¥å£é‡å®šå‘ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 400:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'æ¥å£å‚æ•°ä¸æ­£ç¡®ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 401:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'æœªç™»å½•ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 403:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'æ— æƒé™ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 404:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = `æ¥å£åœ°å€ä¸æ­£ç¡®ï¼`
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 500:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 502:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'ç½‘å…³é”™è¯¯ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 503:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'æœåŠ¡ä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â case 504:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'æœåŠ¡æš‚æ—¶æ— æ³•è®¿é—®ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åå†è¯•ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â  Â  Â default:
 Â  Â  Â  Â message = 'å¼‚å¸¸é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·è”ç³»ç®¡ç†å‘˜ï¼'
 Â  Â  Â  Â break
 Â   }
  }
 Â if (err.code === 'ERR_NETWORK')
 Â  Â message = window.navigator.onLine ? 'æœåŠ¡ç«¯å¼‚å¸¸ï¼' : 'ç½‘ç»œå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥æ‚¨çš„ç½‘ç»œï¼'

 Â console.log(message)
}

const axiosRequest = new AxiosRequest({
 Â rawData: false,
 Â ignoreRepeat: true,
 Â withToken: true,
 Â codeMessageShow: true,
 Â retryConfig: {
 Â  Â isOpen: true,
 Â  Â count: 5,
 Â  Â time: 1000,
  },
 Â timeout: 3000,
 Â withCredentials: true,
 Â baseURL: 'https://api.muchui.net',
})
